name: Me
text: Ah, it changed again.

name: Kirara
text: Looks like it...
Now that it was our second time, we were less surprised.
The slippery feeling faded, and before we knew it, we found ourselves in this grassland tinted by the evening sun.
And of course, there was no trace at all of the cave we had been walking through until now.

name: Kirara
text: The scenery changed without any logical connection... Is this the magic trap you talked about, Fuma?

name: Me
text: Yes. I think it's a similar Jutsu to the one that I got caught in before...
The "Crossroad of Confusion," the magic labyrinth.
It was a trap that caught the target in an enclosed space with no way out,
but the Jutsu this time seemed to be considerably bigger than the previous one.

name: Me
text: Anyway, we need to find the key to undoing it.

name: Kirara
text: The key, huh... What should we do?

name: Me
text: Let's see... First, let's head for the mountain ahead of us.

name: Me
text: For now, we have no choice but to walk around and find some clues.

name: Kirara
text: Alright, got it. Then let's go, Fuma.
Kirara-senpai nodded firmly and started to walk.

name: Me
text: (She's listening to me awfully obediently.)
Just earlierー
『Who's gonna follow your instructions!?』
...that... had been super menacing...

name: Kirara
text: Fuma? What's wrong?

name: Me
text: Ah, no! It's nothing!!
I hurried after her.
If I said something tactless and pissed her off again, it would be a pain...

name: Me
text: ...Kirara-senpai. Can I ask you one question?
Come to think of it, something had been bothering me.
While we walked through the grassland, I called out to Kirara-senpai.

name: Kirara
text: Hm? What is it?

name: Me
text: It's about your power. What I heard earlier surprised me.

name: Me
text: Um... So your power to control cold air is not a Ninja Art, right?

name: Kirara
text: No, it's not. That's the power I inherited from my momーthe power of the Kijin of Frost. Pretty cool, right?
Kirara-senpai must have been very proud of it. She was in high spirits as she spoke.

name: Me
text: Haha, so that's what it was. It was awesome. But... what about a Ninja Art?

name: Kirara
text: Eh?

name: Me
text: No, I mean... I was just wondering if you could use a Ninja Art, Kirara-senpai...
Taimanin were born with the ability to use a single Ninja Art.
If her power to control cold air was not a Ninja Art, I was intrigued to see if there was something else she could use...

name: Kirara
text: Ahhh... That's what you meant...?
Kirara-senpai's face darkened slightly.

name: Me
text: Ah!? No, it's okay! If you don't want to talk about it, you don't have toー
From what Yaemon had said, there seemed to be some complicated circumstances regarding her family.
So I had felt a little uncomfortable prodding, but...

name: Kirara
text: ...I can use one.
However, after thinking for a short moment, Kirara-senpai replied to my question.

name: Me
text: Ehh!? Really!?
If so, it really was amazing.

name: Me
text: Wh-What kind of Ninja Art!? If it's not a bother, I'd like toー

name: Kirara
text: W-Wait...? What are you getting so excited about?

name: Me
text: Ah. S-Sorry...
I guess she could be called aーhybrid Taimanin?
The power of the Oni and the Jutsu of the Taimanin.
It was extremely rare for someone to be able to use those two at the same timeー
Hearing that, I couldn't help but get excited.

name: Kirara
text: Honestly, I don't really want to think back on it. I'm in no mood to ever use my Ninja Art again.

name: Me
text: O-Of course...
It was not a topic that was okay to touch upon rashly.
I privately reflected on that.

name: Kirara
text: ...But.

name: Me
text: Eh?
Kirara-senpai looked at my face and smiled with an expression that said, "Sheesh."

name: Kirara
text: I mean, no point in dwelling on the past forever♪

name: Kirara
text: ーAlright. Since it's you, I'll tell you.

name: Me
text: Really!?
Kirara-senpai beckoned me with a slight wave. I brought my ear close to her lips.

name: Kirara
text: ーーーー
And softly, she whispered the secret she had been hiding deep in her heart.
As we climbed the mountain straight ahead, a bizarre scene once again stretched out before us.

name: Me
text: This is...

name: Kirara
text: Horrible...
Kirara-senpai furrowed her brow.
Did this mean that there had been a war in a place like this?
In the desolate wilderness in front of us, pitiful corpses were strewn about.
And thenー
The woman in the Taimanin suit that we had encountered in the warehouse was just standing there all by herself.

name: Me
text: ...You're the "witch" Euryale, aren't you?
I was grateful. Who would imagine that the person who set the trap would show herself when we were looking for the keyー
The witch was silent and did not answer.

name: Kirara
text: (H-Hey...!? Shouldn't we attack her...?)

name: Me
text: (No, wait just a bit.)
I shook my head to Kirara-senpai, who was whispering in my ear.
There were several things that I wanted to confirm.

name: Me
text: ...A while ago, I got caught up in a certain incident and experienced something called the "Crossroad of Confusion."

name: Me
text: Euryale. That was a magic trap that you designed.
Euryale, the "legendary witch" living a secluded life in Amidahara.
It was only because I was an admirer of her books that I had been able to break free from that trap.
However.

name: Me
text: Less than a month later, you appear before me... Is this just a coincidence?
The witch did not reply.

name: Me
text: ...Then I'll ask a different question. What happened to the Taimanin unit that came to look for you? Andー

name: Me
text: Where are the two that were with us, Hebiko and Shikanosuke...?
And then the witch, who was as still as a ghost, moved for the first time.
Without a word, she pointed to the pile of corpses beside her. And thereー

name: Me
text: (Sh-Shikanosuke!? Hebiko!?)
I couldn't breathe from the shock of it.
The bodies that had been dumped there were, in fact, the members of the Taimanin unit that we had come to look for. Andー
Cruelly ripped to shreds, their intestines exposed, and the light gone from their eyes, the bodies of Hebiko and Shikanosukeー

name: Kirara
text: ～～～～～～!! Yooooouuuuuuuuuuuuuu!!!

name: Me
text: ーWait!! Get ahold of yourself, Kirara-senpai!!
The color drained from the incensed Kirara-senpai's face, and she tried to lunge at the witch.
I barked at her to stop.

name: Kirara
text: Wait!? ーWhy!? That witch killed Shikanosuke-kun and Hebiko-chan!!!

name: Kirara
text: And all of our comrades from the Taimanin unit are also dead!! There isn't a single reason not to kill her!!!

name: Me
text: Even soーwait.
I whispered, desperately trying to suppress the rage welling up within me.
It would be easy to lose myself to anger here.
But that was not what I needed to do right now.

name: Me
text: I want to negotiate with the witch. ...Please trust me, Kirara-senpai.

name: Kirara
text: Even if you tell me to... t-trust you...
Her eyes were wavering.
She bit her lip hard, as if to say she didn't know what to do.
And thenー

name: Witch
text: 『...O human. Seekest thou a parley?』
The witch opened her mouth for the first time.
It was a somewhat mocking, gloomy whisper.

name: Witch
text: 『Thou witnessed thy companions' cruel demise, and yet thou declarest thy wish to entreat with me?』

name: Kirara
text: Y-Youー!

name: Me
text: Kirara-senpaiー!!
I held back Kirara-senpai, who was about to fly into a rage again, and turned toward the witch.

name: Me
text: ...My mission is not to kill you.

name: Me
text: Also, I was told by my higher-ups to avoid unnecessary fights this time.
Of course, that was not the only reason.
But everything else was still uncertain.

name: Witch
text: 『Ohoho...』
The witch laughed mysteriously and glided toward me.
The smell of decadence, like overripe fruit, assailed my nostrils.

name: Witch
text: 『O human, as thou saidstーmeeting me is no coincidence.』

name: Witch
text: 『I connect fates, and thus I conjured this magickー』

name: Me
text: ...Are you saying that this is all the doing of your magic or whatever?
The reason why I had come on this mission...
And also the reason for the bodies of Hebiko and Shikanosuke lying on that heap of corpses...

name: Witch
text: 『Aye. But even if it weren't so, thou art specialー』

name: Witch
text: 『Thou art easily swayed by the "Demonic Fate."』

name: Me
text: Demonic Fate...? What the hell are you talking about...?

name: Witch
text: 『Well now, that'sーHehehe.』
Suddenly, demonic energy exploded out from her body.
Her Taimanin suit form wavered and changed into "something" completely differentー

name: Kirara
text: W-Wait!? What!? What the hell is this!!?

name: Me
text: It's Euryale!! The missing arms, the two giant swords! This is her true formー

name: Euryale
text: Hehe... hehehehe...

name: Euryale
text: If thou wishest to know the answer, survive my bladesー!!
